item.title: DeepSeek 戳穿了 "硅谷能控制人工智能 "的神话
item.description:
在短短两年内，中国的开源人工智能运动使其几乎缩小了与美国同行的差距。【原文：

In just two years, China’s open-source artificial intelligence movement allowed it to virtually close the gap with its US peers.

】

item.title: 印度计划投资 140 亿美元实施石化项目以减少进口
item.description: 据一位高级政府官员透露，印度东部的奥迪沙邦预计将在未来 10 年内投资 1.2 万亿卢比（约合 141 亿美元），在孟加拉湾附近建设一个石化中心。【原文：The eastern Indian state of Odisha is expecting a 1.2 trillion rupees ($14.1 billion) investment over the next 10 years to build a petrochemical hub near the Bay of Bengal, according to a senior government official.】

item.title: 沃尔沃出售 5 亿欧元债券，关税担忧对汽车制造商造成影响
item.description: 沃尔沃财政公司（Volvo Treasury AB）将于周五出售5亿欧元（约合5.63亿美元）的五年期债券，在关税风险迫在眉睫之际，与汽车制造商相关的票据开始进入市场。【原文：Volvo Treasury AB is selling a five-year, €500 million ($563 million) bond on Friday, as automaker-related notes hit the market amid the looming risk of tariffs.】

item.title: S&P 500 指数关键模型两年来首次转为看跌
item.description: 在贸易担忧笼罩金融市场并使美国企业利润增长前景黯淡之后，股市指标进入了一个历史上与 S&P 500 指数最差回报前景相关联的阶段。【原文：A stock-market indicator has entered a phase historically associated with the worst return prospects for the S&P 500 Index after trade fears gripped financial markets and dimmed Corporate America’s outlook for profit growth.】

item.title: 尽管股价涨幅高达 1,500% ，Swissquote 仍寻求撼动与加密货币的联系
item.description: 2017 年，当 Swissquote Group Holding SA 成为首家允许客户交易比特币的欧洲银行时，加密货币的交易价格约为每枚 2000 美元。【原文：When Swissquote Group Holding SA became the first European bank to let clients trade Bitcoin in 2017, the cryptocurrency was changing hands for around $2,000 per token.】

item.title: 中国称将严厉打击战略矿产走私活动
item.description: 商务部周五表示，中国将严厉打击战略矿产走私活动，要求官员加强检查，以配合出口管制的加强。【原文：China will clamp down on the smuggling of strategic minerals, the Ministry of Commerce said on Friday, mandating officials to tighten checks in line with increased export controls.】

item.title: 随着贸易紧张局势的缓解，以太币在 2021 年以来最好的一周飙升 30
item.description: 受全球贸易紧张局势缓和以及对网络升级的乐观情绪推动，以太币本周引领了加密货币的广泛反弹，并将创下自 2021 年以来的最强涨势。【原文：Ether led a broad cryptocurrency rally this week, heading for its strongest gains since 2021, bolstered by easing global trade tensions and optimism over a network upgrade.】

item.title: EDP 认为停电后伊比利亚电力市场分裂不会造成影响
item.description: EDP SA 是葡萄牙的一家公用事业公司，在西班牙也有发电厂，该公司首席执行官米格尔-斯蒂尔韦尔-德安德拉德（Miguel Stilwell d'Andrade）表示，预计不会受到 4 月 28 日大停电后伊比利亚电力市场暂时分裂的影响。【原文：EDP SA, a Portuguese utility that also operates power plants in Spain, doesn’t expect to see an impact from a temporary split in the Iberian electricity market following the April 28 blackout, Chief Executive Officer Miguel Stilwell d’Andrade said.】

item.title: 搜索警告频出，Alphabet股价暴跌1200亿美元
item.description: 一年多来，Alphabet 公司的股东们一直在担心人工智能给该公司的 "印钞机 "搜索业务带来的长期风险。本周，这种威胁变得更为直接。【原文：For more than a year, Alphabet Inc. shareholders have fretted over long-term risks posed by artificial intelligence to the company’s money-printing search business. This week the threat became much more immediate.】

item.title: 法德两国财政部长着眼于欧盟政策的新阶段
item.description: 在弗里德里希-梅尔茨（Friedrich Merz）本周被确认为德国总理后，德国和法国的财政首脑在巴黎举行了首次会晤，誓言要推动欧洲政策制定进入一个新阶段。【原文：Germany and France’s finances chiefs vowed to drive a new phase in European policy making as they met for the first time in Paris after the confirmation of Friedrich Merz as German chancellor this week.】

item.title: 欧元数十年来最快涨势因期权转移而得到加强
item.description: 欧元二十年来最快的涨势得到了期权交易的支持，这表明欧洲共同货币的结构性转变已经开始。【原文：The euro’s fastest rally in two decades is being backed up by options trades that point to the start of a structural shift for Europe’s common currency.】

item.title: 欧洲央行西姆库斯称美国关税影响经济增长，需要更多减税措施
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员格迪米纳斯-西姆库斯（Gediminas Simkus）表示，欧洲央行必须进一步降低利率，因为欧元区经济尚未感受到美国关税的全部影响，预计通胀将继续放缓。【原文：The European Central Bank must lower interest rates further as the euro-area economy is yet to feel the full force of US tariffs and inflation is expected to continue to slow, Governing Council member Gediminas Simkus said.】

item.title: 印度审查美国降低转基因作物进口限制的要求
item.description: 知情人士称，印度正在分析美国提出的放宽转基因作物购买限制的请求，这是两国正在进行的贸易谈判的一部分。【原文：India is analyzing a US request to ease restrictions around the purchase of genetically modified crops as part of ongoing trade negotiations between the two countries, people aware of the matter said.】

item.title: 小麦供应紧张，价格易受天气影响
item.description: 预计新季小麦供应仍将紧张，如果主要种植国在临近收割前天气恶化，市场价格很容易上涨。【原文：Wheat supplies are expected to remain tight in the new season, leaving the market vulnerable to higher prices if weather worsens in key growers before the approaching harvest.】

item.title: 泰国央行三次降息后政策空间有限
item.description: 泰国央行行长 Sethaput Suthiwartnarueput 表示，泰国央行在近期降息后 "弹药 "有限，他呼吁采取更多有针对性的措施，以保护东南亚第二大经济体免受美国关税的影响。【原文：Thailand’s central bank has limited “ammunition” after recent interest rate cuts, according to Governor Sethaput Suthiwartnarueput, who called for more targeted measures to shield Southeast Asia’s second-largest economy from the impact of US tariff.】

item.title: 美银美林的哈特内特预计股市涨势将因美国贸易协议而消退
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）的迈克尔-哈特内特（Michael Hartnett）认为，即使美国采取措施进行贸易谈判，美股的惊人反弹也很可能已经结束。【原文：The stunning US stock rebound is likely over, even as the US takes steps toward trade negotiations, according to Bank of America Corp.’s Michael Hartnett.】

item.description:

Scrambling to adjust.

item.title: 西班牙大停电显示了可再生能源密集型世界对电池的需求
item.description:
各公司正在研究从电池到人工智能的各种技术，这些技术有助于确保可再生能源和更多的电力需求不会威胁到电网。【原文：

Companies are working on technologies from batteries to AI that can help ensure renewables and more electricity demand don’t threaten the grid.

】

item.description: 一个美国服装品牌谈关税威胁【原文：A US Clothing Brand On the Threat From Tariffs】

item.title: 特斯拉供应商松下将大裁员一万人
item.description: 松下控股公司（Panasonic Holdings Corp.）表示，公司计划裁员 10,000 人，这是公司通过裁减非增长业务来提高盈利能力的持续举措之一。【原文：Panasonic Holdings Corp. said it plans to slash headcount by 10,000, part of an ongoing push to boost profitability by culling non-growth operations.】

item.title: 欧盟考虑放宽证券化对银行流动性缓冲的影响
item.description: 欧盟委员会正在考虑做出改变，使银行持有资产担保证券作为其紧急现金储备的一部分更具吸引力。【原文：The European Commission is considering changes that would make it more appealing for banks to hold asset-backed securities as part of their emergency cash reserves.】

item.title: 波兰政策制定者打算进一步缓慢降息
item.description: 两位政策制定者表示，波兰在本周降息后不应急于进一步降息，因为通胀风险仍然很高。【原文：Poland shouldn’t rush to reduce interest rates further after this week’s cut because inflation risks remain high, according to two policymakers.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长雷恩称通货紧缩已步入正轨，经济增长前景趋弱
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员奥利-雷恩（Olli Rehn）表示，由于美国的关税政策，欧洲央行的前景并不明朗。【原文：The European Central Bank’s outlook is unclear because of US tariff policy, according to Governing Council member Olli Rehn.】

item.title: 台币对贸易伙伴货币汇率飙升至创纪录水平
item.description: 本周，台币对其主要贸易伙伴货币的汇率飙升至历史新高，有可能突破央行密切关注的水平。【原文：A gauge of the Taiwan dollar against its major trading partners’ currencies surged to a record high this week, threatening to breach a level closely watched by the central bank.】

item.title: 德国 DAX 指数再创新高，扭转关税退步局面
item.description: 德国 DAX 指数收复了美国总统唐纳德-特朗普贸易战引发的所有跌幅，成为首个突破 3 月份纪录高点的欧洲指数。【原文：Germany’s DAX Index became the first European gauge to surpass its March record high, recouping all declines sparked by US President Donald Trump’s trade war.】

item.title: 德国警方在 "eXch "行动中查获 3400 万欧元加密资产
item.description: 德国当局关闭了位于该国的加密货币交换服务机构 "eXch"，并扣押了价值 3400 万欧元（3800 万美元）的资产。【原文：German authorities closed down the crypto-swapping service “eXch” located in the nation and seized assets worth €34 million ($38 million).】

item.title: 瑞士丢失的现金为政府带来 11 亿美元意外之财
item.description: 20 世纪 70 年代丢失的钞票将给瑞士带来一笔意外之财。【原文：Lost banknotes from the 1970s are set to give Switzerland a windfall.】

item.title: Adnoc Drilling 首席财务官预计今年收购额将达 5 亿美元
item.description: 阿拉伯联合酋长国最大石油公司的钻井部门预计将在今年下半年进行三项收购，总金额约为 5 亿美元，同时将扩展技术和硬件以促进增长。【原文：The drilling unit of the United Arab Emirates’ biggest oil company expects to make three acquisitions in the second half of this year totaling about $500 million, as it expands in technology and hardware to bolster growth.】

item.title: 瑞银要求银行家停止在中国短期出差时乘坐公务机
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，瑞银集团已指示银行家们在前往中国的短期旅行中停止乘坐公务舱，以调整其全球差旅政策，并在交易缓慢的情况下削减在亚洲的成本。【原文：UBS Group AG has instructed bankers to stop flying business class on short trips to China, seeking to align its global travel policy and cut costs in Asia amid slow dealmaking, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 津巴布韦人争相投资房地产，将其作为应对经济动荡的避风港
item.description: 由于货币不确定性和经济政策的频繁转向吓跑了投资者，津巴布韦人正在抢购房产作为避风港，而此时该国股市正处于低迷状态。【原文：Zimbabweans are snapping up properties as a safe-haven against currency uncertainty and the frequent economic policy u-turns that have scared off investors, at a time when a popular hedge — the country’s stock market — is underperfoming.】
